name: xmartOWallpixel
0:
”Alexa, show the camera name”
”Alexa, stop the camera name”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
xmartO Wallpixel is designed for home or business surveillance from xmartO Wallpixel App. With the skill and Alexa, you can interact with your xmartO cameras with Alexa voice control.

To get started, select the 'Enable Skill' button to link your xmartO Wallpixel account and discover your xmartO cameras. Find more information about connecting smart home devices at，

While using the skill, you need to name your devices. There are two ways to name your cameras.

Once you know the name or group name for your devices, you can give commands such as:

"Alexa, show the camera name"
"Alexa, stop the camera name"
